Name: AFK
Description: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

Name: Axiom Arc 1
Description: When your units kill an enemy they gain 20 Mana.

Name: Band Of Thieves 1
Description: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

Name: Battlemage 1
Description: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Armor and 15 Ability Power.

Name: Big Friend 1
Description: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 2000 Health take 10% less damage for the rest of combat.

Name: Blue Battery 1
Description: After casting their Ability, your units restore 20 Mana.

Name: Built Different 1
Description: Your units with no Traits active gain 300 Health and 50% Attack Speed.

Name: Celestial Blessing 1
Description: Your units heal for 10% of the damage dealt by attacks and abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

Name: Combat Training
Description: Your Champions permanently gain 1 Attack Damage every time they kill an enemy unit. Champions start with 2 Attack Damage.

Name: Consistency
Description: Gain double streak gold.

Name: Cybernetic Implants 1
Description: Your units equipped with an item gain 200 Health and 8 Attack Damage.

Name: Cybernetic Shell 1
Description: Your champions holding an item gain 150 Health and 30 Armor.

Name: Cybernetic Uplink 1
Description: Your champions holding an item gain 150 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

Name: Disintegrator 1
Description: Your unit's attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 1.5% of the target's maximum Health.

Name: Double Trouble 1
Description: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 22 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you upgrade to 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

Name: Electrocharge 1
Description: When your units receive a critical strike, they deal 100 magic damage to nearby enemies.

Name: Exiles 1
Description: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 25% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

Name: Featherweights 1
Description: Your 1 and 2 cost units gain 45% movement and Attack Speed.

Name: First Aid Kit 1
Description: All healing and shielding received by your units is increased by 25%.

Name: Future Sight 1
Description: Know who you will fight next. Gain a Zephyr.

Name: Item Grab Bag 1
Description: Gain 1 random completed item and 1 Reforger.

Name: Knife's Edge 1
Description: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Attack Damage.

Name: Lategame Specialist
Description: Gain 40 gold when you reach Level 9.

Name: Luden's Echo 1
Description: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 150 bonus magic damage.

Name: Makeshift Armor 1
Description: Your units with no items gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

Name: Pandora's Bench
Description: Gain 5 gold. At the start of every turn, Champions in your 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random Champions of the same cost.

Name: Pandora's Items
Description: Gain a random component. At the start of each turn, items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

Name: Preparation 1
Description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 6 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 24.

Name: Recombobulator
Description: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions that cost 1 more. Gain 3 Magnetic Removers.

Name: Second Wind 1
Description: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 50% of their missing Health.

Name: Stand United 1
Description: Your units gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your team.

Name: Thrill Of The Hunt 1
Description: Your units heal 300 Health on kill.

Name: Tiny Titans
Description: Your Tactician heals 35 Health, grows larger, and has 135 maximum Health.

Name: Tri Force 1
Description: Your 3-cost champions gain 233 Health, 13 starting Mana, and 23% Attack Speed.

Name: A.D.M.I.N. Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional A.D.M.I.N. Gain a Camille.

Name: Anima Squad Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Anima Squad. Gain a Jinx.

Name: Brawler Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Brawler. Gain a Vi.

Name: Spellslinger Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Spellslinger. Gain an Annie.

Name: Sureshot Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Sureshot. Gain a Sivir.

Name: Defender Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Defender. Gain a Rell.

Name: Duelist Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Duelist. Gain a Fiora.

Name: Gadgeteen Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Gadgeteen. Gain an Annie.

Name: Hacker Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Hacker. Gain 2 gold.

Name: Heart Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Heart. Gain a Lee Sin.

Name: Lasercorps Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional LaserCorps. Gain a Yasuo.

Name: Mascot Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mascot. Gain a Yuumi.

Name: Ox Force Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ox Force. Gain a Fiora.

Name: Recon Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Recon. Gain an Ezreal.

Name: Renegade Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Renegade. Gain a Camille.

Name: Star Guardian Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Star Guardian. Gain a Yuumi.

Name: Supers Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Super. Gain a Malphite.

Name: Underground Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Underground. Gain a Vi.
